Nicolò Bertani

You'll have to cope with this picture from my previous consulting life till I get a better one (certainly without a tie).

Contacts:

    Ph.D student in Decision Sciences at INSEAD

    I am currently pursuing my doctorate in Decision Sciences at INSEAD, under the supervision of Enrico Diecidue and Ville Satop채채, with expected graduation in 2020-21.

    I work on individual decision making and forecasting, particularly with high-dimensional (probability) models. I value applications that can have societal upsides. I am currently working on environmental decision making and urban crime forecasting.


    On this website

    On this website, you can find news and resources related to my research, in line with the principles of open research, which I fully support. I will also try to cultivate a more generic blog. The latest additions to the website are listed below, for convenience.


    If you want to get in touch, do not hesitate to do so using the contact information in the left part of this page.


    Latest research

    • Fast and Simple Adaptive Elicitations: Experimental Test for Probability Weighting,

      Under review.
